content: Joining us on today's call are Rick Swartz, President and Chief Executive Officer; Betty Johnson, Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer; Tod Cooper, Senior Vice President and Chief Operating Officer of MYR Group's Transmission and Distribution Segment; and Jeff Waneka, Senior Vice President and Chief Operating Officer of MYR Group's Commercial and Industrial segment. Following Betty's overview, Tod Cooper and Jeff Waneka, Chief Operating Officers for our T&D and C&I segments will provide a summary of our segment performance and discuss some of MYR Group's opportunities going forward. Our second quarter T&D revenues were at a record high of $415.2 million, an increase of 27% compared to the same period last year. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
